reviewText:
Wooden action. Dead script. Made in the bad old days with Goral Janosik fighting class warfare
with the petty nobility. Dumb.

A pity Amazon does not attend to some of the post Communist era movies such as

1. Przed Wiosna (Before the Spring)
2. Sysifowy Pracy (Sisyphean labors)
3. Quo Vadis
